tool_description: Searches for journal entries based on specific topics or themes, with filtering and ranking capabilities.

topics.description: List of topics to search for

error_messages: Empty topics: At least one topic must be provided
Topic too vague: Each topic should be at least 3 characters and descriptive
usage: Provide topics array and optionally set match_mode and time_period to find entries discussing specific themes.

entry_ids.description: List of entry IDs matching the topic criteria

topic_match_scores.description: Topic relevance scores for each matching entry

matches_found.description: Total number of entries matching the topic search
